${modID}:AStepAhead.NAME: A Step Ahead
${modID}:AStepAhead.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a card, gain !M! Block.
${modID}:AStepAhead.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. Whenever you draw a card, gain !M! Block.

${modID}:AgreeToDisagree.NAME: Agree To Disagree
${modID}:AgreeToDisagree.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Vulnerable stacks from target enemy. Gain that much Dexterity. Exhaust.

${modID}:AntiquePistol.NAME: Antique Pistol
${modID}:AntiquePistol.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Exhaust. ${modID}:Cachet: Permanently increase this card's damage by !M!.

${modID}:AtALoss.NAME: At A Loss
${modID}:AtALoss.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card this turn, ALL enemies lose !M! HP.

${modID}:Backhand.NAME: Backhand
${modID}:Backhand.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If this card is exhausted, gain !M! Strength.

${modID}:BadAttitude.NAME: Bad Attitude
${modID}:BadAttitude.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a power, ALL enemies gain !M! Poison.

${modID}:BigTalker.NAME: Big Talker
${modID}:BigTalker.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a skill, apply !M! Demoralize to ALL enemies.

${modID}:BornOnThird.NAME: Born On Third
${modID}:BornOnThird.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, add !M! random Skill card(s) to your hand.

${modID}:Untrustworthy.NAME: Untrustworthy
${modID}:Untrustworthy.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison for each stack of Weak and Vulnerable. Exhaust.

${modID}:CharismaForm.NAME: Charisma Form
${modID}:CharismaForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. At the start of each turn, gain !M! ${modID}:Confidence.
${modID}:CharismaForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, gain !M! ${modID}:Confidence.

${modID}:Condescend.NAME: Condescend
${modID}:Condescend.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain !B! Block. Apply !M! Vulnerable and !M! Weak.

${modID}:CuttingWords.NAME: Cutting Words
${modID}:CuttingWords.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. ${modID}:Cachet: Deal an additional !D! damage per stack of ${modID}:Confidence.

${modID}:DanceOnEm.NAME: Dance On 'Em
${modID}:DanceOnEm.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. ALL enemies lose !M! Strength and gain !M! Weak. Exhaust.

${modID}:DelayGratification.NAME: Delay Gratification
${modID}:DelayGratification.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. Permanently increase this card's damage by !M! when drawn. Deal !D! damage. Exhaust.

${modID}:Diatribe.NAME: Diatribe
${modID}:Diatribe.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

${modID}:Dissuade.NAME: Dissuade
${modID}:Dissuade.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. ${modID}:Cachet: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength. Exhaust.

${modID}:Distract.NAME: Distract
${modID}:Distract.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. If this card is exhausted, gain 2 Dexterity.

${modID}:Entitlement.NAME: Entitlement
${modID}:Entitlement.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, draw !M! card(s).

${modID}:FieryTemper.NAME: Fiery Temper
${modID}:FieryTemper.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal !M! damage back.

${modID}:Gossip.NAME: Gossip
${modID}:Gossip.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Apply !M! Poison to ALL enemies.

${modID}:ImperiousAffect.NAME: Imperious Affect
${modID}:ImperiousAffect.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you deal unblocked attack damage, apply !M! Vulnerable.

${modID}:Inheritance.NAME: Inheritance
${modID}:Inheritance.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a power, draw a card.
${modID}:Inheritance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. Whenever you play a power, draw a card.

${modID}:InsultToInjury.NAME: Insult To Injury
${modID}:InsultToInjury.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Whenever you play a skill, return this from the discard pile to your hand.

${modID}:KeepInMind.NAME: Keep In Mind
${modID}:KeepInMind.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Select !M! card(s) to Retain this turn.

${modID}:MakingDonations.NAME: Making Donations
${modID}:MakingDonations.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is exhausted, gain !M! block.

${modID}:Narcissism.NAME: Narcissism
${modID}:Narcissism.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, gain !M! Dexterity and !M! Strength.
${modID}:Narcissism.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. At the start of each turn, gain !M! Dexterity and !M! Strength.

${modID}:Patron.NAME: Patron
${modID}:Patron.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a power, add a random power card into your hand.

${modID}:PenPals.NAME: Pen Pals
${modID}:PenPals.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a card, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.
${modID}:PenPals.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. Whenever you draw a card, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:PowerNap.NAME: Power Nap
${modID}:PowerNap.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! card(s) in your hand. Gain !M! [E] and draw !M! card(s). Exhaust.
${modID}:PowerNap.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! cards in your hand. Gain !M! [E] and draw !M! cards. Exhaust.

${modID}:PracticedAffect.NAME: Practiced Affect
${modID}:PracticedAffect.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a skill, gain !M! block.
${modID}:PracticedAffect.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. Whenever you play a skill, gain !M! block.

${modID}:Predict.NAME: Predict
${modID}:Predict.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you attack any enemy, gain !M! Block. Exhaust.

${modID}:Purify.NAME: Purify
${modID}:Purify.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. ${modID}:Cachet: Exhaust every Status and Curse card in your hand and discard pile.
${modID}:Purify.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. ${modID}:Cachet: Exhaust every Status and Curse card in your hand, discard pile, and draw pile.

${modID}:Question.NAME: Question
${modID}:Question.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. ${modID}:Cachet: Enemy loses !M! Strength. Exhaust.

${modID}:RiskyBiscuit.NAME: Risky Biscuit
${modID}:RiskyBiscuit.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. ${modID}:Cachet: Costs 1 [E] less per stack of ${modID}:Confidence.

${modID}:Roughhouse.NAME: Roughhouse
${modID}:Roughhouse.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain !M! Plated Armor. Exhaust.

${modID}:Savings.NAME: Savings
${modID}:Savings.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. ${modID}:Cachet: Next turn draw !M! additional card(s).

${modID}:Schadenfreude.NAME: Schadenfreude
${modID}:Schadenfreude.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an enemy receives a debuff, gain !M! block.

${modID}:SharpenYourTeeth.NAME: Sharpen Your Teeth
${modID}:SharpenYourTeeth.DESCRIPTION: Draw until you draw !M! Attack(s). Exhaust.
${modID}:SharpenYourTeeth.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw until you draw !M! Attacks. Exhaust.

${modID}:ShoppingSpree.NAME: Shopping Spree
${modID}:ShoppingSpree.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a power, gain !M! block.

${modID}:SideEye.NAME: Side Eye
${modID}:SideEye.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison to ALL enemies. Draw !M! card(s).

${modID}:SillyAffect.NAME: Silly Affect
${modID}:SillyAffect.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you deal unblocked attack damage, apply !M! Weak.

${modID}:SocialChameleon.NAME: Social Chameleon
${modID}:SocialChameleon.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! random power card(s) into your hand. Exhaust. Cachet: They cost 0 this turn.

${modID}:SocialClimber.NAME: Social Climber
${modID}:SocialClimber.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a skill that costs 0, draw !M! card(s).

${modID}:SpectralDisposition.NAME: Spectral Disposition
${modID}:SpectralDisposition.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, return !M! random playable card(s) from your exhaust pile to your hand.
${modID}:SpectralDisposition.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, return !M! random playable cards from your exhaust pile to your hand.

${modID}:SpectralFog.NAME: Spectral Fog
${modID}:SpectralFog.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is exhausted, ALL enemies lose !M! HP.

${modID}:SpectralHounds.NAME: Spectral Hounds
${modID}:SpectralHounds.DESCRIPTION: Return !M! card(s) not named Spectral Hounds from your Exhaust pile. Exhaust.

${modID}:SpinTheNarrative.NAME: Spin the Narrative
${modID}:SpinTheNarrative.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. ${modID}:Cachet: Deal !D! damage for each card in your hand.

${modID}:Stockpile.NAME: Stockpile
${modID}:Stockpile.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. ${modID}:Cachet: At the end of combat, heal !M! HP. Exhaust.

${modID}:TalkOver.NAME: Talk Over
${modID}:TalkOver.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Whenever you play a card this turn, ALL enemies lose !M! HP.

${modID}:TargetedCriticism.NAME: Targeted Criticism
${modID}:TargetedCriticism.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Cachet: Deal !D! damage for every stack of debuff on ALL enemies.

${modID}:TheBestWords.NAME: The Best Words
${modID}:TheBestWords.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Whenever you play a card this turn, ALL enemies lose !M! HP.

${modID}:ThrowTheGlove.NAME: Throw The Glove
${modID}:ThrowTheGlove.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. ${modID}:Cachet: Draw cards until your hand is full. Exhaust.
${modID}:ThrowTheGlove.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. ${modID}:Cachet: Draw cards until your hand is full.

${modID}:Unselfconscious.NAME: Unselfconscious
${modID}:Unselfconscious.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity. Gain !M! Strength. Shuffle a pair of Dazed into your draw pile.

${modID}:WeightRoom.NAME: Weight Room
${modID}:WeightRoom.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a skill this turn, gain !M! temporary Strength.

${modID}:WideSwipe.NAME: Wide Swipe
${modID}:WideSwipe.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. ${modID}:Cachet: Instead, deal double damage to ALL enemies.
